page.title: 11CHURCH CLOCK & STONE KNIGHT
page.content:
{Church clock} On the level below the bells is the clock, it is in a large pantry_like cupboard and has two weights, one on the left of the room and one on the right. You can wind the clock up by opening the cupboard and using a sort of crank to wind the weights, the weight on the left is to keep the clock going and the one on the right is to ring the bell on the hour.
{The stone knight} In the church is a stone statue of a knight in armour. He is pictured with his legs resting on his dog, this is to show that he died at home. He probably died when the first church was built, in about 1320 and someone made a statue of him and put it in the church. But his name is still unknown.
